trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Jupiter
There were no other sightings in Jupiter on or around November 30th 1988
divs: sighting detailsthe witness and a freind were driving near juno beach\ jupiter florida in a convertible. the first witness noticed something coming off the ocean from the east. there was no structure or lights, just large as half a football feild blocking out the stars. he brought it to the attention of his freind who was driving. they both watched in amazement as the object went overhead and they lost sight of it to the west as it passed over condos. it was going slow, made no noise and they beleive they could have easily missed seeing it.
